metadata.title: CVE-2021-29266 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.11.9.drivers/vhost/vdpa.c has a use-after-free because v->config_ctx has aninvalid value upon re-opening a character device, aka CID-f6bbf0010ba0.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
